name: Marble Race (itch)
description:
Get the marble to the finish as fast as you can. Test your reflexes as you race down the hill. Control the marble with the gyroscope or virtual joystick. Avoid enemies and traps down on the race track.

★ Unique colorful and charming levels each with specific theme (more will come with future updates)

★ Exciting enemies and traps better to avoid

★ Play with your friends or AI in Arena mode

★ Leaderboards & Achievements
